name: git-buttons
description: Git Buttons for Visual Studio Code

configuration.title: Git Buttons
configuration.description: Buttons to show in source control pane

git-buttons.title: Git Buttons in SCM
git-buttons.description: Buttons to show in source control pane

git-buttons-fileview.title: Git Buttons in FileView
git-buttons-fileview.description: Buttons to show in fileview pane

git-buttons-conflict.title: Merge-Conflict Buttons in Editor Title
git-buttons-conflict.description: Buttons to show in Editor Title

view/title.when: view == workbench.explorer.fileView && gitOpenRepositoryCount == 1 && config.git-buttons-fileview.pullContext || view == workbench.explorer.fileView && config.git-buttons-fileview.pull
view == workbench.explorer.fileView && gitOpenRepositoryCount == 1 && config.git-buttons-fileview.pushContext || view == workbench.explorer.fileView && config.git-buttons-fileview.push

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run compile-web
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run lockfile-lint
